- * @summary test that if a class file has ACC_PRIMITIVE set then it must be run
- *          with option -XX:+EnableValhalla.
+ * @summary test that if a class file has ACC_VALUE or ACC_PRIMITIVE set then it must be run
+ *          with option -XX:+nableValhalla or -XX:+EnablePrimitiveClasses respectively.
@@ -29,1 +29,2 @@

+ * @run main/othervm -XX:-EnableValhalla -XX:-EnablePrimitiveClasses BadACCValue ACC_VALUE

@@ -35,1 +36,1 @@

+        System.out.println("Testing: " + test_name + " Expecting CFE with message: " + message);
@@ -38,0 +39,1 @@
+            throw new RuntimeException("Managed to load primitive class with -XX:-EnablePrimitiveClasses");
@@ -46,4 +48,5 @@
-
-        // Test ACC_PRIMITIVE causes a CFE unless -XX:+EnableValhalla is specified.
-        runTest("ValueFieldNotFinal",
-                "Class modifier ACC_PRIMITIVE in class ValueFieldNotFinal requires option -XX:+EnableValhalla");
+        // Test correct error message for disabled Valhalla features
+        String message = args[0].equals("ACC_VALUE") ?
+            "Class modifier ACC_VALUE in class ValueFieldNotFinal requires option -XX:+EnableValhalla" :
+            "Class modifier ACC_PRIMITIVE in class ValueFieldNotFinal requires option -XX:+EnablePrimitiveClasses";
+        runTest("ValueFieldNotFinal", message);

@@ -0,0 +1,588 @@
+/*
+ * Copyright (c) 2022, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.
+ * DO NOT ALTER OR REMOVE COPYRIGHT NOTICES OR THIS FILE HEADER.
+ *
+ * This code is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it
+ * under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 only, as
+ * published by the Free Software Foundation.
+ *
+ * This code is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT
+ * ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or
+ * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU General Public License
+ * version 2 for more details (a copy is included in the LICENSE file that
+ * accompanied this code).
+ *
+ * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License version
+ * 2 along with this work; if not, write to the Free Software Foundation,
+ * Inc., 51 Franklin St, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301 USA.
+ *
+ * Please contact Oracle, 500 Oracle Parkway, Redwood Shores, CA 94065 USA
+ * or visit www.oracle.com if you need additional information or have any
+ * questions.
+ *
+ */
+
+
+/*
+ These test classes contains variations of Q-type signature uses which should
+ only work with +EnablePrimitiveClasses
+
+ The original source with all the illegal cases looks like this, then below
+ are classes with a single aspect declared (for each line in the prototype
+ class listed)
+
+ public class PrimitiveUsers {
+    MyPrimitive p;
+    public static void staticCheckQArg(MyPrimitive p) {}
+    public static MyPrimitive staticCheckQReturn() { return MyPrimitive.default; }
+    public void checkQArg(MyPrimitive p) {}
+    public MyPrimitive checkQReturn() { return MyPrimitive.default; }
+ }
+*/
+
+// Use Q-signature field...
+
+class PrimitiveUsersField {
+  0xCAFEBABE;
+  0; // minor version
+  64; // version
+  [] { // Constant Pool
+    ; // first element is empty
+    Method #2 #3; // #1
+    class #4; // #2
+    NameAndType #5 #6; // #3
+    Utf8 "java/lang/Object"; // #4
+    Utf8 "<init>"; // #5
+    Utf8 "()V"; // #6
+    class #8; // #7
+    Utf8 "PrimitiveUsersField"; // #8
+    Utf8 "p"; // #9
+    Utf8 "QMyPrimitive;"; // #10
+    Utf8 "Code"; // #11
+    Utf8 "LineNumberTable"; // #12
+    Utf8 "SourceFile"; // #13
+    Utf8 "PrimitiveUsersField.java"; // #14
+  } // Constant Pool
+
+  0x0021; // access
+  #7;// this_cpx
+  #2;// super_cpx
+
+  [] { // Interfaces
+  } // Interfaces
+
+  [] { // Fields
+    {  // field
+      0x0000; // access
+      #9; // name_index
+      #10; // descriptor_index
+      [] { // Attributes
+      } // Attributes
+    }
+  } // Fields
+
+  [] { // Methods
+    {  // method
+      0x0001; // access
+      #5; // name_index
+      #6; // descriptor_index
+      [] { // Attributes
+        Attr(#11) { // Code
+          1; // max_stack
+          1; // max_locals
+          Bytes[]{
+            0x2AB70001B1;
+          }
+          [] { // Traps
+          } // end Traps
+          [] { // Attributes
+            Attr(#12) { // LineNumberTable
+              [] { // line_number_table
+                0  2;
+              }
+            } // end LineNumberTable
+          } // Attributes
+        } // end Code
+      } // Attributes
+    }
+  } // Methods
+
+  [] { // Attributes
+    Attr(#13) { // SourceFile
+      #14;
+    } // end SourceFile
+  } // Attributes
+} // end class PrimitiveUsersField
+
+
+// Static method q-sig in arg
+
+class PrimitiveUsersStaticQArg {
+  0xCAFEBABE;
+  0; // minor version
+  64; // version
+  [] { // Constant Pool
+    ; // first element is empty
+    Method #2 #3; // #1
+    class #4; // #2
+    NameAndType #5 #6; // #3
+    Utf8 "java/lang/Object"; // #4
+    Utf8 "<init>"; // #5
+    Utf8 "()V"; // #6
+    class #8; // #7
+    Utf8 "PrimitiveUsersStaticQArg"; // #8
+    Utf8 "Code"; // #9
+    Utf8 "LineNumberTable"; // #10
+    Utf8 "staticCheckQArg"; // #11
+    Utf8 "(QMyPrimitive;)V"; // #12
+    Utf8 "SourceFile"; // #13
+    Utf8 "PrimitiveUsersStaticQArg.java"; // #14
+  } // Constant Pool
+
+  0x0021; // access
+  #7;// this_cpx
+  #2;// super_cpx
+
+  [] { // Interfaces
+  } // Interfaces
+
+  [] { // Fields
+  } // Fields
+
+  [] { // Methods
+    {  // method
+      0x0001; // access
+      #5; // name_index
+      #6; // descriptor_index
+      [] { // Attributes
+        Attr(#9) { // Code
+          1; // max_stack
+          1; // max_locals
+          Bytes[]{
+            0x2AB70001B1;
+          }
+          [] { // Traps
+          } // end Traps
+          [] { // Attributes
+            Attr(#10) { // LineNumberTable
+              [] { // line_number_table
+                0  2;
+              }
+            } // end LineNumberTable
+          } // Attributes
+        } // end Code
+      } // Attributes
+    }
+    ;
+    {  // method
+      0x0009; // access
+      #11; // name_index
+      #12; // descriptor_index
+      [] { // Attributes
+        Attr(#9) { // Code
+          0; // max_stack
+          1; // max_locals
+          Bytes[]{
+            0xB1;
+          }
+          [] { // Traps
+          } // end Traps
+          [] { // Attributes
+            Attr(#10) { // LineNumberTable
+              [] { // line_number_table
+                0  4;
+              }
+            } // end LineNumberTable
+          } // Attributes
+        } // end Code
+      } // Attributes
+    }
+  } // Methods
+
+  [] { // Attributes
+    Attr(#13) { // SourceFile
+      #14;
+    } // end SourceFile
+  } // Attributes
+} // end class PrimitiveUsersStaticQArg
+
+// Static method q-sig in return
+
+class PrimitiveUsersStaticQReturn {
+  0xCAFEBABE;
+  0; // minor version
+  64; // version
+  [] { // Constant Pool
+    ; // first element is empty
+    Method #2 #3; // #1
+    class #4; // #2
+    NameAndType #5 #6; // #3
+    Utf8 "java/lang/Object"; // #4
+    Utf8 "<init>"; // #5
+    Utf8 "()V"; // #6
+    class #8; // #7
+    Utf8 "MyPrimitive"; // #8
+    class #10; // #9
+    Utf8 "PrimitiveUsersStaticQReturn"; // #10
+    Utf8 "Code"; // #11
